synopsis: In this heartfelt episode, Devam and Ahir delve into the complexities of anxiety, sharing their personal experiences and insights. They emphasize the importance of embracing emotions, understanding the roots of anxiety, and fostering self-compassion as a means to navigate life's challenges.
quotes: You don't have to be perfect; you just have to be you.
Anxiety is not just a part of who I am; it’s something I can learn to manage.
It gets easier every day, but you got to do it every day—that's the hard part.
If you feel like you need to avoid something because of anxiety, that’s a sign you need to face it.
You can’t control everything that happens, but you can control how you respond.
We all have the right to feel our emotions; sadness is just as valid as happiness.
Sometimes you have to accept that the voice in your head is just noise.
The hardest part is realizing that you can’t outrun your feelings; you have to walk through them.
You never know how much weight you're carrying until you start to let it go.
Anxiety can be a fog, but underneath it lies the clarity of who you truly are.
